description: Try our easy to follow Mango, Apple & Mint Chutney recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chutney,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mango, Apple & Mint Chutney Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 green mango, peeled, stoned and roughly chopped
1 small apple, peeled, cored and roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the ingredients into a food processor or blender and process until smooth.
Transfer the mixture to a small serving dish, cover and chill until required. The chutney will keep for up to 3 days in the refrigerator.
